items.title: New York prison guard convicted in inmate's fatal beating, two others acquitted
items.summary: NEW YORK (Reuters) -A jury convicted a former New York correctional officer of murder in the fatal beating of an inmate late last year while acquitting two other former guards in the killing, which prompted Governor Kathy Hochul to order sweeping prison reforms. Read full story

items.summary: WASHINGTON (Reuters) -A group of hundreds of former U.S. national security officials on Tuesday urged lawmakers to examine an internal government group that has been coordinating President Donald Trump's retribution drive against his perceived enemies. Read full story

items.summary:

This is regularly a $1,550 notebook that’s powered by AMD’s Ryzen 7 260 octa-core processor and an RTX 5060 GPU, and it’s now seeing a straight-up $500 discount. We’ve seen the Intel-powered Legion 5i variant of this notebook go for less, but today’s deal at Walmart marks the lowest price we have tracked for this model, delivering serious value for folks looking for a reliable machine for gaming. For comparison, the same laptop is currently fetching $1,100 and $1,150 at Best Buy and directly at Lenovo, respectively. Head below for more details.
